Module com.broudy
Package com.broudy.control

Class StageManager

java.lang.Object
com.broudy.control.StageManager
public class StageManager
extends java.lang.Object
A singleton class to allow seamless screen switching.

Created on the 31th of March, 2020.

Author:
Julian Broudy

    • loadViewNodeHierarchy

      private javafx.scene.Parent loadViewNodeHierarchy​(FXMLView fxmlView)
      This method loads the passed {@see FXMLView} after all its dependencies if any are resolved by the {@see boundary.EnhancedFXMLLoader} and returns the top-most node of the FXML's hierarchy.
      Parameters:
      fxmlView - the {@see FXMLView} to be loaded.
      Returns:
      the root node {@see Parent} of the loaded {@see FXMLView}.
